subject: Bobsledding
Eyes and Eyesight
Olympic Games (2010)
Keratoconus
lead_paragraph: For Steve Holcomb, the pilot of the top U.S. bobsled, addressing a degenerative eye disease and improving his vision led to new challenges.
snippet: For Steve Holcomb, the pilot of the top U.S. bobsled, addressing a degenerative eye disease and improving his vision led to new challenges.
